edu.upenn.cis.ppod.dao
Interface IDAO<T,ID extends Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the transfer object.
ID - the type of the persistence id.
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAttachmentDAO, IAttachmentNamespaceDAO, IAttachmentTypeDAO, ICharacterDAO, ICharacterStateDAO, ICharacterStateMatrixDAO, ICharacterStateRowDAO, IOTUDAO, IOTUSetDAO, IPPodGroupDAO, IPPodRoleDAO, IPPodVersionInfoDAO, IStudyDAO, ITreeDAO, ITreeSetDAO, IUserDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
AttachmentDAOHibernate, AttachmentNamespaceDAOHibernate, AttachmentTypeDAOHibernate, CharacterStateMatrixDAOHibernate, GenericHibernateDAO, HibernateDAOFactory.CharacterDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.CharacterStateDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.CharacterStateRowDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.OTUDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.OTUSetDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.PPodGroupDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.PPodRoleDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.TreeDAOHibernate, HibernateDAOFactory.TreeSetDAOHibernate, PPodVersionInfoDAOHibernate, StudyDAOHibernate, UserDAOHibernate
public interface IDAO<T,ID extends Serializable>

A DAO interface.

From http://www.hibernate.org/328. html.

Author:
Sam Donnelly, from http:// www.hibernate.org/328.html.

Method Summary
 T delete(T entity)
          Make the given entity transient.
 List<T> findAll()
          Retrieve all Ts.

          Do a find by example with the given example instance and properties to exclude.
 T get(ID id, boolean lock)
          Given a persistence id id, retrieve the corresponding T.

          Return the identifier value of the given entity as associated with this IDAO's session.

          Save or update entity.
 

Method Detail

findAll

List<T> findAll()
Retrieve all Ts.

Returns:
all persisted Ts

findByExample

List<T> findByExample(T exampleInstance,
                      String... excludeProperty)
Do a find by example with the given example instance and properties to exclude.

Parameters:
exampleInstance - the example instance
excludeProperty - properties to exclude in the find by example
Returns:
the results of the search

get

T get(ID id,
      boolean lock)
Given a persistence id id, retrieve the corresponding T. If id is null, returns null.

Parameters:
id - see description
lock - use an upgrade lock. Objects loaded in this lock mode are materialized using an SQL select ... for update.
Returns:
the retrieved object, or null if there is no such object or if id is null

getIdentifier

Serializable getIdentifier(Object o)
Return the identifier value of the given entity as associated with this IDAO's session. An exception is thrown if the given entity instance is transient or detached in relation to the session.

Parameters:
o - a persistent instance
Returns:
the identifier

delete

T delete(T entity)
Make the given entity transient. That is, delete entity.

Parameters:
entity - to be made transient
Returns:
entity

saveOrUpdate

T saveOrUpdate(T entity)
Save or update entity.

Parameters:
entity - entity object
Returns:
entity
